##################
# FUNCTION: for loop
# INPUTS: numeric vector
# OUTPUTS: calculated number of 0s in the numeric vector
#----------------------------
forLoop <- function(z = sample(0:10, 100, replace = TRUE)) {
  for(i in seq_along(z)) next
  if(z[i]!=0) next 
  cat("i=",i,"z[i]",z[i],"\n")
}




return(print(z[i]))
